message.content:
{"id": "13725", 
"title": "Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.", 
"description": "When closing and reopening a file in the java editor, the process is fast. However, when selecting 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor, it takes 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original. This is much slower than the close and reopen method.", 
"OB": "To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:\n1. Open a file in the java editor.\n2. Make some changes to the file.\n3. Answer 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog.\n4. Double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it.\n5. Repeat steps 1-4, and then select 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor.", 
"EB": "The 'Revert' operation should not take longer than closing and reopening the file.", 
"SR": "Investigate and fix the performance issue with the 'Revert' operation in the java editor to make it as fast as the close and reopen method."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '13725', 'title': 'Bug 13725Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.', 'description': 'Bug 13725Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor. ', 'OB': 'answer "no" to the "do you want to save changes" dialog double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it.However, if I repeat steps 1) and 2), and then select "Revert" from the pop upmenu in the editor it takes15 seconds to replace the contents of the windowwith the original. ', 'EB': 'This seems odd, since reverting the file contents ought notto be more than closing and reopening the file. ', 'SR': ''}
